title: PDF Question-Answering System using RAG and LLMs
description: A Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) based PDF Question-Answering system that enables users to upload PDF documents and ask natural language questions, receiving accurate answers derived exclusively from the uploaded content.

title: GEMINIBRIDGE : A Multilingual prompting approach to Low-Resource Language Upliftment
description: A multilingual prompting-based NLP system designed to uplift low resource languages. It enables translation, intent detection, and slot filling for languages like Telugu, Bengali, Persian, Spanish, and Thai.

title: Pixel to Prognosis:Image based Cervical Cancer Classification and Prediction using CNN Architecture
description: The main objective of the Pixel to Prognosis project is to a model that combines multiple models to improve cervical cancer prediction, risk classification accuracy and cancer class classification using CNN Architecture.
